projects.name: Japanese Tax Expert System (JTES)
projects.summary: Specialized retrieval-augmented assistant for Japanese tax workflows.
outcomes: Built evidence-grounded answer flow with citations
Improved retrieval relevance using domain-specific chunking

projects.name: Insurance Reporting & Incident Intelligence
projects.summary: Workflow automation for insurance reporting and incident intelligence tasks.
outcomes: Reduced manual report preparation through structured AI assistance
Standardized triage flow for faster analyst handoff

projects.name: Receipt Classification and Matching System
projects.summary: Receipt ingestion pipeline with categorization and matching support.

projects.name: Enterprise Data Migration and Governance (AIG / Smart Partners)
projects.summary: Led large-scale enterprise data migration and governance delivery across insurance platforms.
outcomes: Supported multi-system migration with zero critical data loss during mainframe sunset
Built compliance-ready governance workflows and risk-based reporting
Reduced manual data correction effort through workflow optimization

projects.name: Infrastructure Scale and DR/BCP Delivery (AXA / Smart Partners)
projects.summary: Delivered infrastructure transformation programs across global, high-availability enterprise environments.
outcomes: Managed infrastructure refresh for 10,000+ clients and 400+ servers
Directed post-merger infrastructure standardization and DR/BCP implementation
Coordinated multi-region delivery teams across Japan, EMEA, and North America

projects.name: GenAI Enablement and Change Leadership
projects.summary: Cross-functional delivery leadership focused on adoption, enablement, and enterprise transformation outcomes.
outcomes: Created governance and steering reporting across scope, schedule, budget, and risk
Led stakeholder alignment and vendor coordination for complex delivery programs
Applied structured communication and adoption plans across multi-team initiatives

projects.name: Application and Integration Delivery (Education / Depot Systems)
projects.summary: Delivered application and integration projects with hybrid local/offshore teams and strict launch deadlines.
outcomes: Launched web-based university mock exam platform on schedule with client acceptance
Implemented AS/400 and warehouse integration improvements for inventory and shipping operations
Owned delivery lifecycle from requirements through closure across multi-stakeholder teams

constraints.location: United States and Japan (open to remote and hybrid)
constraints.availability: Open to full-time, consulting, or advisory AI/IT delivery roles
